</ul></li></ul><div class="clear"></div></div><ul class="thumbnails"><li><a href="race/tour-de-france">Tour de France</a></li><li>&nbsp; » &nbsp;</li><li><a href="race/tour-de-france/2022">2022</a></li><li>&nbsp; » &nbsp;</li><li><a href="race/tour-de-france/2022/startlist">Startlist</a></li></ul><div class="page-title "><a class="mobileMenuLink showIfMobile menu-toggle" href="">menu</a><div class="main"><span class="flag fr w32"></span><span class="flag fr w24"></span><span class="hideIfMobile">2022</span><span class="hideIfMobile">»</span><font class="hideIfMobile">109th</font><h1 class="">Tour de France</h1><font class="hideIfMobile">(2.UWT)</font></div></div><div class="clear"></div><div class="desktop-ad leaderbord race"></div><div class="mob-ad leaderbord race"></div><div class="top-cont"></div><div class="top-cont-mobile top-cont-mobile-race"></div><div class="page-content page-object default " data-no_menu="0"><h2>Startlist</h2><div class=" ">
<a style="float: right; font-size: 11px; text-transform: uppercase; color: #aaa; display: block; padding: 3px 7px; margin-bottom: 6px; " class="showDiv" data-id="pdfOptions" href="">more pdf options</a><div class="hide" data-id="pdfOptions" style="float: right; "><a class="icon pdf" target="_blank" style="margin-left: 6px; " href="pdf/startlist.php?id=51604&amp;option=ucicode">Incl. uci-code</a><a class="icon pdf" target="_blank" style="margin-left: 6px; " href="pdf/startlist.php?id=51604&amp;option=gc">Incl. GC times</a><a class="icon pdf" target="_blank" style="margin-left: 6px; " href="pdf/startlist.php?id=51604&amp;option=flags">Incl. flags</a><a class="icon pdf" target="_blank" style="margin-left: 6px; " href="pdf/startlist.php?id=51604&amp;option=gc,flags">Incl. gc+flags</a><a class="icon pdf" target="_blank" style="margin-left: 6px; " href="pdf/startlist.php?id=51604&amp;option=ext">Shirts+info</a></div><a class="icon pdf fs14" target="_blank" href="pdf/startlist.php?id=51604">Startlist</a><select onchange="window.location.href=this.value;   "></a></div><div class="ridersCont"><div><a class="team" href="team/alpecin-deceuninck-2022">Alpecin-Deceuninck (PRT)</a><div class="clear"></div></div><ul><li class=" "><span class="bib">101</span><span class="flag nl"></span><a href="rider/mathieu-van-der-poel">VAN DER POEL Mathieu</a> (DNF #11)</li><li class=" "><span class="bib">102</span><span class="flag ch"></span><a href="rider/silvan-dillier">DILLIER Silvan</a></li><li class=" "><span class="bib">103</span><span class="flag at"></span><a href="rider/michael-gogl">GOGL Michael</a> (DNF #5)</li><li class=" "><span class="bib">104</span><span class="flag de"></span><a href="rider/alexander-krieger">KRIEGER Alexander</a></li><li class=" "><span class="bib">105</span><span class="flag be"></span><a href="rider/jasper-philipsen">PHILIPSEN Jasper</a>*</li><li class=" "><span class="bib">106</span><span class="flag be"></span><a href="rider/edward-planckaert">PLANCKAERT Edward</a></li><li class=" "><span class="bib">107</span><span class="flag it"></span><a href="rider/kristian-sbaragli">SBARAGLI Kristian</a></li><li class=" "><span class="bib">108</span><span class="flag be"></span><a href="rider/guillaume-van-keirsbulck">VAN KEIRSBULCK Guillaume</a></li></ul><div class="dsCont"><b>DS</b> <a href="staff/christoph-roodhooft">ROODHOOFT Christoph</a>, <a href="staff/frederik-willems">WILLEMS Frederik</a></div></div></li><li><div class="shirtCont"><a href="team/team-dsm-2022"><img src="images/shirts/bx/eb/team-dsm-2022.png" style="width: 100%; <div class="footer">
  <div class="sfa"><ul class="ftr-list"><li class="group"><h3>Grand Tours</h3><ul><li><a href="race/tour-de-france">Tour de France</a></li>
<li><a href="race/giro-d-italia">Giro d'Italia</a></li>
<li><a href="race/vuelta-a-espana">Vuelta a España</a></li>
</ul><h3>Major Tours</h3><ul><li><a href="race/paris-nice">Paris-Nice</a></li>
<li><a href="race/tirreno-adriatico">Tirreno-Adriatico</a></li>
